Package game.view

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
game.view.Tile
public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a single tile on the GameBoard and provides functionality for animation

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the animation (60 times a second) depending on the direction the tile moves (if it moves) and if it merges with another tile

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Creates the tile in the graphic. Considers the current animation.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D-Object, on which the tile should be painted
